column1: }}'''Isilmo''' was the younger brother of [[Ruling Queen of Númenor
column2: Queen]] [[Tar-Telperiën]]. He had a son named [[Minastir]]. Tar-Telperiën outlived Isilmo, but she refused to wed and had no children. Thus, Tar-Telperiën was succeeded by Isilmo's son, her nephew, who became [[Tar-Minastir]].<ref>{{UT

column1: ''Isilmo'' means "Man of the Moon" in [[Quenya]] (from ''[[Moon#Other names
column2: Isil]]'', 'Moon', and the masculine agentive suffix ''[[-mo]]'').
